tests.name: Routing.Forward
tests.setup: if [ ! -f ".built" ]; then touch .built && rm -rf test_classroom && rm -rf build && git clone https://github.com/N2Sys-EDU/lab3-test.git test_classroom && cd test_classroom && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && cd ../.. && mkdir -p build/ && cp test_classroom/libsimulator.a test_classroom/build/lab3_test build/ && cd build && cmake .. && make && cd .. ; fi
